channel.title: I need help please help me!
channel.description: ok so i just made a server...but when i attack npcs the dont attack back.... y?does anyone have a solution to this?

item.title: I need help please help me!
item.dc:creator: @usernamenotavailable usernamenotavailable
item.description:
@usernamenotavailable wrote:

    if you have a 317 like i do, then you need to open your npchandler.java and hopefully your jad and kq
    already fight back. search for something that looks like -

if (npcs[i].npcType == 1158
|| npcs[i].npcType == 2745) {
npcs[i].StartKilling = person.playerId;
npcs[i].RandomWalk = false;
npcs[i].IsUnderAttack = true;
} else if (person.distanceToPoint(
npcs[i].absX, npcs[i].absY)
then in between add it again to make it look like this
if (npcs[i].npcType == 1158
|| npcs[i].npcType == “npc id”)
|| npcs[i].npcType == 2745) {
npcs[i].StartKilling = person.playerId;
npcs[i].RandomWalk = false;
npcs[i].IsUnderAttack = true;
} else if (person.distanceToPoint(
npcs[i].absX, npcs[i].absY)
and you can keep adding npcs in between there like that, just dont add the bracket to 1 in the middle because it gives you 100 compile errors. Anyway i hope this helped!

Read full topic
